title: Beef noodle stir fry
ingredients: ['250g Chinese noodles', 'oil, as needed for cooking', '1 beef steak, cut into thin strips', '4 garlic cloves, thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon fresh ginger, minced', '4 spring onions, chopped', 'salt, to taste', '1 onion, halved and sliced', '1 courgette, diced', '1 red pepper, sliced', '1 yellow pepper, sliced', '10 sugar snap peas', '1 package beansprouts', 'soya sauce, to taste', 'toasted sesame oil, to taste']
